verses.roman:
dṛṣṭānta diyā kahi tabe loka yadi jāne
kṛṣṇa-līlā--nitya, jyotiścakra-pramāṇe

synonyms: dṛṣṭānta diyā—giving an example; kahi—let Me say; tabe—then; loka—people; yadi—if; jāne—can understand; kṛṣṇa-līlā—pastimes of Lord Kṛṣṇa; nitya—eternal; jyotiḥ-cakra—of the zodiac; pramāṇe—by evidence.
translation: "Let me give an example by which people may understand Lord Kṛṣṇa's eternal pastimes. An example can be found in the zodiac.
